name: Repustate
description: Repustate is a web based natural language toolkit. Using an open and free API, Repustate allows any 3rd party to build their own marketing tools (brand monitoring, sentiment analysis etc.). By commoditizing the technical aspects of market research, Repustate hopes to unearth the more creative and insightful aspects of social media analysis.
